Name: CHALICE
About the game: a short VR experience focused on the most extreme experiences possible in VR . this is an abstract musical experience where the player is taken from location to location in a loose narrative focus on door-to-door face salesman. you can expect to be disorientated slightly nauseous, lost, disturbed amd left with a feeling of dread. key features interactable VR environments original music intense visuals length 15 minutes Credits Design - Ben Lunato OST - Noah Chalfant OST - INVISIBLE ROBOT HANDS
Meta Title: CHALICE: Jun 7, 2020, ben lunato and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on CHALICE? Check out the release date (Jun 7, 2020), developer insights from ben lunato, and a complete game summary.
